0.8.name: wordpress/zikiplugin
0.8.description: This plugin aims at displaying the Ziki profile ("http://www.ziki.com") in a sidebar widget. You can display: - avatar - ziki link - Ziki profile name - Real name - Baseline - Profile links (technorati, facebook, linkedin...) - Fans and friends number - Feedburner and technorati stats - Display last Twitter baseline
